text: memories fade bro...but that local culture vibe sticks
Always thought casa was just four walls till life threw some curveballs... turns out it's those random convos or late study nights that plant home in your heart wherever you land.
buses packed like sardine cans during carnival season... defy physics everyday 😂😅
always walking more lately...it's free gym!
Metro’s definitely quicker than traffic jams here—feels like winning at life dodging those peak-hour snail races!
Turned into Houdini just trying not get squished!
managing money? thought i'd be pro now... joke's on me cause every month feels like lvl 1 all over again - plot twist nobody saw coming 😂
All that cash flow going into crystal balls when folks need real financial planning... Just goes to show how priorities can get all twisted!
Sadly, sometimes even numbers get disregarded by haters...
